name: The Sun Rises in the North
name_original: The Sun Rises in the North
description:
Note: This project is still in development. Feel free to critique the story at your own will. 

Note 2: The ending of the game had to come to a close in order to meet a deadline. The ending scene will eventually be spread out to make it more fluid. 

TSRN is an Interactive Fiction game set in the world of the Undergrowth. The Undergrowth is a world opposite of Earth. It is filled with many wonders and adventures.

Enjoy <3
